data.fullContent: It's a poor financial strategy to invest your money in random stocks. While it is true that nobody can divert the fact of stocks, you are as likely to lose money as earn it if you pick from a random selection. Instead, you should shape your portfolio to reflect the diversity of the market overall. Following the fortunes of the whole market will ultimately yield gains over many years.
data.answer: 把钱随便投资在股票上是个糟糕的理财策略。虽然没有人能够转移股票的事实，但如果你从随机选择中进行选择，你既可能赚到钱，也可能会亏钱。相反，你应该调整你的投资组合，以反映市场整体的多样性。追随整个市场的命运，最终将在多年后产生收益。
